title: Italian crusty herb bread
ingredients: ['15g (1/2 oz) dried active baking yeast', '450ml (16 fl oz) warm water (45 C)', '2 tablespoons caster sugar', '4 tablespoons olive oil', '1 tablespoon salt', '1 tablespoon dried basil', '1 tablespoon dried oregano', '1 clove garlic, minced', '50g (2 oz) grated Pecorino Romano cheese', '800g (1 3/4 lb) bread flour']
